# BoringPy Documentation

Welcome to the BoringPy documentation! This directory contains detailed guides and resources for using and contributing to BoringPy.

## üìö Contents

### For Users

- **[Main README](../README.md)** - Getting started, installation, and usage
- **[CHANGELOG](../CHANGELOG.md)** - Version history and release notes

### For Contributors

- **[Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - How to contribute to BoringPy
- **[Development Setup](development.md)** - Working with AI agents and development workflow
- **[Publishing Guide](publishing.md)** - How to publish new versions to PyPI

### Architecture

- **[Template System](templates.md)** - How templates work (coming soon)
- **[Generator Architecture](architecture.md)** - Internal design (coming soon)

## üìñ Additional Resources

### Generated Project Docs

When you generate an API with BoringPy, each project includes its own README with:
- Project-specific setup instructions
- Available Makefile commands
- Database configuration
- Deployment guidelines

### External Documentation

- [FastAPI Documentation](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/)
- [SQLModel Documentation](https://sqlmodel.tiangolo.com/)
- [Alembic Documentation](https://alembic.sqlalchemy.org/)
- [uv Documentation](https://github.com/astral-sh/uv)
- [Typer Documentation](https://typer.tiangolo.com/)

## ü§ù Need Help?

- **Questions**: Open a [GitHub Discussion](https://github.com/gverdugo-g14/boringpy14/discussions)
- **Bugs**: Report an [Issue](https://github.com/gverdugo-g14/boringpy14/issues)
- **Contributing**: Read the [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

**Happy coding with BoringPy! üöÄ**
